channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: States Weekly: January 28, 2026
item.description: This edition of States Weekly covers January 28, 2026.

item.title: AI and Grand Strategy: The Case for Restraint
item.description: Artificial intelligence may not reward a military arms race, but instead favor strategic restraint, economic capacity, and the ability to mobilize capital, infrastructure, and partnerships that shape long-term power and influence.

item.title: Can the 2025 Clean Competition Act Cut Global Emissions and Maintain U.S. Competitiveness?
item.description: The 2025 U.S. Clean Competition Act addresses the twin challenges of maintaining U.S. industrial competitiveness and accelerating industrial decarbonization by pairing a domestic performance fee with carbon import tariffs on carbon-intensive, trade-exposed sectors.
